item.title: Apple Lobbies India To Avoid Billions In Potential Tax On iPhone Manufacturing Equipment: Report
item.description: The iPhone maker has urged the Indian government to revise tax rules to align with global framework

item.title: Rupee Rebounds After RBI’s Aggressive Intervention In Currency Markets
item.description: The central bank is reportedly determined to prevent the rupee from breaching the psychologically significant ₹89-₹90 level

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty Reclaims 25,300 As Rate Cut Hopes Lift Sentiment; Realty, PSU Banks Lead Rally
item.description: Broader markets outperformed, with midcaps and smallcaps gaining up to 1%. Strong earnings from Persistent and ICICI Lombard further fueled sentiment.

item.title: Two Reasons Why Paytm Shares Rose Over 3% Today
item.description: The company unveiled a sweeping restructuring plan to consolidate its financial services arms and received an upgrade from Axis Securities.

item.title: Swing Trade Alert: BEML, Navkar Show Breakout Signals, Says SEBI Analyst
item.description: Both stocks show potential for over 10% upside in the near term, supported by volume action and trend reversals.
